TopicTitle: Weird KSC bug (Camera stuck in space)

Articles.Content:
I tried searching for various things relating to camera bugs, but didn't find any that were the same as my problem

I have quite a few mods installed. stock works all good. Have tried removing some mods but it can be intermittent so I dont really know if I have ever fixed it or not.

I have no idea how to reproduce it or what could be causing it... I've tried totally reinstalling ksp and the mods about 3 times now and each time with slightly less mods, but nothing has helped

the problem I get is that I start up everything is good build something doesn't matter which bay I use. then play the game can go to the map fine and stuff. then when I want to go back to the space centre all I get is a view of space it, it looks as if the camera has gotten stuck in space or something and I can't select any of the buildings and quitting to the main menu doesn't help as If I reload it just goes back to the same thing. I have to quit completely out and then restart ksp and everything is back to normal until I switch back to a flight or launch a new flight the problem happens again.

I thought it might have been the Lazor system or Protractor cause it seemed to happen 100% of the time after I used these modules for planetary interception and stuff, but I had it occur without those even installed so not sure what's going on.
